contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Radio station | name = XHARZ | image = | city = [[Aguascalientes, Aguascalientes]], [[Mexico]] | area = [[Aguascalientes]] | branding = La Sanmarqueña | slogan = | airdate = | frequency = 100.1 FM | format = regional [[Mexico|Mexican]] | power = 90,000 w | erp = | class = | callsign_meaning = '''A'''rnoldo '''R'''odriguez '''Z'''ermeño (owner of the station) | former_callsigns = | owner = Grupo Radiofónico ZER | webcast = | website = | affiliations = }} '''XHARZ''' is a regional [[Mexico|Mexican]] [[radio station]] that serves the state of [[Aguascalientes]]. Every hour, the station airs messages made by [[Focus on the Family]] founder Dr. [[James Dobson]] <br clear=all> {{Aguascalientes Radio}} {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} [[Category:Regional Mexican radio stations]] [[Category:Spanish-language radio stations]] [[Category:Radio stations in Aguascalientes]] [[Category:Media in Aguascalientes, Aguascalientes]]
